title: Çıplak
overview: Eylül lives with her grandmother and earns her living as an escort. All she wants is to save enough money, move to Wales and create a new life there. One night she is summoned to a bachelor party by a group of friends who find her on Instagram. Eylül falls in love with the future groom Cem, who is counting the days to marry a socialite girl. Cem is also attracted to Eylül. After that night, Cem and Eylül's lives begin to mix.
